translated: therefore this Great Vehicle surpasses and goes beyond the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.”🔽“Subhūti, if the world with its gods, humans, and asuras were existent and not nonexistent,🔽then this Great Vehicle would not surpass and go beyond the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.🔽Subhūti, because the world with its gods, humans, and asuras is not existent and is nonexistent,🔽therefore this Great Vehicle surpasses and goes beyond the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.”

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin chad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi bar du sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin chad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi bar du sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
translated: Subhuti: If the Bodhisattva, the great being, from the first thought of enlightenment onwards, were to have a thought of covetousness, or a thought of malice, or a thought of harmfulness, or a thought of greed, or a thought of foulness, or a thought of vanity, or a thought of pride, or a thought of a false view, or a thought of the level of a Disciple or a Pratyekabuddha, or a thought of anything else, then that thought would not be in conformity with the thought of the knowledge of all modes.🔽

original: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
translated: Subhūti, if the thoughts that have arisen in the mind of a bodhisattva great being from the time he first began to set his mind on enlightenment up until he is seated at the site of awakening were things that existed and were not nonexistent,

original: theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: then this Great Vehicle would not overpower and attain emancipation from the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pos sems dang po bskyed phyin chad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi bar du sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pos sems dang po bskyed phyin chad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi bar du sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas /
translated: Subhūti, because the thoughts that have arisen in the mind of a bodhisattva great being from the time he first began to set his mind on enlightenment up until he is seated at the site of awakening are not things that exist and are not nonexistent,

original: de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no //
translated: this Great Vehicle overpowers and attains emancipation from the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yi shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yi shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
translated: Subhūti, if the vajra-like wisdom of the bodhisattva great beings were a thing

original: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
translated: and not a non-thing,

original: theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: then this Great Vehicle would not overpower and attain emancipation from the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po med la dngos po ma @379a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po med la dngos po ma @379a *//
translated: Subhūti, because the vajra-like wisdom of the bodhisattva great beings is not a thing and is not not a thing,

original: yin pas / de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: yin pas / de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no //
translated: therefore this Great Vehicle overpowers and attains emancipation from the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
translated: Subhūti, if the vajra-like wisdom of the bodhisattva great beings were a thing

original: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
translated: and not a non-thing,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par khong du chud cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par khong du chud cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang mi 'gyur /
translated: “Subhūti, if the knowledge of the bodhisattva great beings were a thing and not a non-thing, bodhisattva great beings would not have understood all the afflictions with their residual impression connections to be a non-thing and would not have attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: They would not have outshone and appeared in the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas /
translated: “Subhūti, because the vajra-like knowledge of bodhisattva great beings is a non-thing and not a thing,

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par khong du chud de /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par khong du chud de /
translated: therefore bodhisattva great beings have understood all the afflictions with their residual impression connections to be a non-thing.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'thob /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'thob /
translated: They have attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no //
translated: They have outshone and appeared in the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.”🔽“Lord, if all dharmas are a non-thing, what is the bodhisattva great beings’ object of apprehension in the perfection of wisdom?

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
translated: Subhuti : If the thirty-two marks of a superman were something real,🔽

original: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /🔽de bzhin gshegs @379b pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni / de bzhin gshegs @379b pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing /
translated: Subhūti, if the thirty-two major marks of a bodhisattva great being were things and not non-things,

original: gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lham mer mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lham mer mi 'gyur /
translated: then the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas would not outshine the world with its gods, humans, and asuras with their splendor and glory.

original: lhan ner mi 'gyur /
analyzed: lhan ner mi 'gyur /
translated: They would not shine,🔽glow,

original: lhang nger mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: lhang nger mi 'gyur te /
translated: or be radiant.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas /
translated: Subhūti, because the thirty-two major marks of a tathāgata, worthy one, perfectly complete buddha are not things and are not non-things,

original: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te /
translated: Therefore, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, outshines the world with its gods, humans, and asuras,

original: gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lha ma me lhan ni lhang nger gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lha ma me lhan ni lhang nger gyur ba yin no //
translated: and he shines forth with splendor and glory.

original: rab 'byor / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
translated: Subhūti, if the light of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One were a thing

original: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
translated: and not a non-thing,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs par mi mdzad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs par mi mdzad de /
translated: then the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One would not fill with light the world systems in the ten directions, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po med la /
translated: Subhūti, the light of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One is not a thing

original: dngos po ma yin pas /
analyzed: dngos po ma yin pas /
translated: and not a non-thing,

original: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa mdzad @380a *//
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa mdzad @380a *//
translated: Therefore, the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas fill with light the world systems of the ten directions as numerous as the sands of the River Ganges.

original: do // rab 'byor /
analyzed: do // rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /🔽dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te / dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
translated: if the speech of the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas endowed with the sixty branches were a thing and not a non-thing,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar yang mi mdzad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar yang mi mdzad de /
translated: then the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas would not make their voices resound throughout the world systems of the ten directions as numerous as the sands of the River Ganges.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas /
translated: Subhūti, the speech of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, endowed with sixty aspects, is not a thing, and is not a non-thing.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar mdzad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar mdzad do //
translated: Therefore, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, makes himself understood by speech in the world systems of the ten directions, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.

original: rab 'byor / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
translated: Subhūti, if the wheel of the Dharma of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, were a thing,

original: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam bram ze'am /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam bram ze'am /
translated: and not a non-thing,

original: lha 'am / bdud dam /
analyzed: lha 'am / bdud dam /
translated: then the wheel of the Dharma of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, could not be turned by the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, in such a way that no ascetic, or brahmin, or god,

original: tshangs pa 'am sus kyang rung ste /
analyzed: tshangs pa 'am sus kyang rung ste /
translated: or Māra, or Brahmā, or anyone else in the world could find an opportunity to dispute it.

original: 'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus bskor bar yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus bskor bar yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: it would not be possible to turn the wheel of the Dharma in the world, and it would not be turned.

original: @380b rab 'byor /
analyzed: @380b rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po med de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po med de /
translated: the wheel of the Dharma of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, is not a thing,

original: dngos po ma yin pas /🔽de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam /🔽bram ze 'am /🔽lha'am / bdud dam /
analyzed: dngos po ma yin pas / de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam / bram ze 'am / lha'am / bdud dam /
translated: and it is not a non-thing.

original: tshangs pa 'am /🔽sus kyang rung ste /
analyzed: tshangs pa 'am / sus kyang rung ste /
translated: Therefore, the wheel of the Dharma of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, which cannot be turned by any ascetic, or brahmin, or god, or Māra, or Brahmā,

original: 'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa rab tu bskor ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa rab tu bskor ro //
translated: or anyone else in the world, is turned.

original: rab 'byor / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te /
translated: Subhūti, if those sentient beings for whose sake the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One turns the wheel of the Dharma were a thing,

original: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ma yin na ni /
translated: and not a non-thing,

original: sems can de dag phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems can de dag phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: those sentient beings will not attain final nirvāṇa in the expanse beyond sorrow where no aggregates remain.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po med de /
translated: Subhūti, those sentient beings for whose sake the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas turn the wheel of the Dharma are not things.

original: dngos po ma yin pas /🔽de'i phyir sems can rnams phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //🔽yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o //
analyzed: dngos po ma yin pas / de'i phyir sems can rnams phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so // yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o //
translated: They are not things,

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and therefore sentient beings have attained final nirvāṇa, will attain final nirvāṇa, and are attaining final nirvāṇa in the expanse beyond sorrow where no aggregates remain.

original: rab 'byor / gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du /
translated: Subhūti, you said,

original: theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes smras pa ni de de @381a *//🔽bzhin no // rab 'byor /
analyzed: theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes smras pa ni de de @381a *// bzhin no // rab 'byor /
translated: ‘That Great Vehicle is equal to space.’🔽Subhūti, it is just so.

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: Subhūti, it is just so.

original: theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam mo //
analyzed: theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam mo //
translated: That vehicle is equal to space.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / nam mkha' la ni shar phyogs dmigs su med do //
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' la ni shar phyogs dmigs su med do //
translated: in space the eastern direction is not apprehended,

original: lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / bla dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / bla dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams dmigs su med do //
translated: the southern direction, the western direction, the northern direction, above, below, and the intermediate directions are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la /
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, in this Great Vehicle

original: shar phyogs dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shar phyogs dmigs su med do //
translated: the eastern direction is not apprehended,

original: lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / bla dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / bla dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams dmigs su med do //
translated: the southern direction, the western direction, the northern direction, above, below, and the intermediate directions are not apprehended.

original: de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this vehicle is said to be equal to space.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta sta /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta sta /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / nam mkha' ni ring po ma yin /
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' ni ring po ma yin /
translated: Space is not long,

translated: Subhūti, it is because those beings, the dharma-constituent, space, the Great Vehicle, the immeasurable, the incalculable,

analyzed: mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro // rab 'byor / gzhan yang sems can med pa'i phyir / de bzhin nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and all dharmas are all non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir /🔽nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //🔽nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir / nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o // nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhuti, you should know that the suchness of beings does not exist because beings do not exist.🔽You should know that space does not exist because suchness does not exist.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the Great Vehicle does not exist because space does not exist.🔽You should know that the immeasurable does not exist because the Great Vehicle does not exist.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the incalculable does not exist because the immeasurable does not exist.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir /🔽mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir / mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because there is no one who is not satisfied.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because there is no one who is not satisfied,

original: chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste /
translated: one should know that all dharmas are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po @386b de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po @386b de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhūti, for this reason too the Great Vehicle accommodates immeasurable, innumerable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because sentient beings, suchness, space, the Great Vehicle, non-apprehension, non-satisfaction,

original: mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: non-estimation, and all dharmas—all of them—are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, one should know that because of the nonexistence of a self, sentient beings do not exist.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //🔽srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o // srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there are no sentient beings, one should know that there is no life-force.🔽Because there is no life-force, one should know that there is no going.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //🔽skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //🔽gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o // gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o // skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o // gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no going, one should know that there is no coming.🔽Because there is no coming, one should know that there is no person.🔽Because there is no person, one should know that there is no individual.🔽Because there is no individual, one should know that there is no human.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //🔽shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o // shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no human, one should know that there is no maker.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no maker, one should know that there is no experiencer.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no experiencer, one should know that there is no knower.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no knower, one should know that there is no seer.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The limit of reality should be known as nonexistent because there is no seer.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Space should be known as nonexistent because the limit of reality is nonexistent.

original: @387a *// nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: @387a *// nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The Great Vehicle should be known as nonexistent because space is nonexistent.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The immeasurable should be known as nonexistent because the Great Vehicle is nonexistent.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The incalculable should be known as nonexistent because the immeasurable is nonexistent.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The unequaled should be known as nonexistent because the incalculable is nonexistent.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: All phenomena should be known as nonexistent because the unequaled is nonexistent.🔽Subhūti, for this reason too

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de ni /
translated: the Great Vehicle of those bodhisattvas is said to be the Great Vehicle.

original: sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: It provides scope for immeasurable, incalculable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, the sentient being, the living being, the nourished being, the person, the man, the human,

original: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
translated: the one who lives, the one who feels, the one who knows, the one who sees, the very limit of reality,

original: nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro ////
analyzed: nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro ////
translated: space, the Great Vehicle, the immeasurable, the incalculable, the infinite, and all phenomena are all unapprehendable.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya @387b pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya @387b pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po don gcig pa //
analyzed: bam po don gcig pa //
translated: fascicle 1

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, because of the non-existence of a self,

original: sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: one should know that sentient beings do not exist.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because sentient beings do not exist, one should know that life does not exist.

original: srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //🔽skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //🔽gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o // 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o // gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o // skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o // gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because life does not exist, one should know that a person does not exist.🔽Because a person does not exist, one should know that an individual does not exist.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because an individual does not exist, one should know that a human being does not exist.🔽Because a human being does not exist, one should know that a human does not exist.

original: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because a human does not exist, one should know that a maker does not exist.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because a maker does not exist, one should know that a feeler does not exist.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no one who feels, one should know there is no one who is active.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no one who knows, one should know there is no one who sees.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no one who sees, one should know there is no inconceivable element.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir gzugs med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir gzugs med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no inconceivable element, one should know there is no form.

original: gzugs med pa'i phyir tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽tshor ba med pa'i phyir 'du shes med par rig par bya'o //🔽'du shes med pa'i phyir 'du byed med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phyir tshor ba med par rig par bya'o // tshor ba med pa'i phyir 'du shes med par rig par bya'o // 'du shes med pa'i phyir 'du byed med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no form, one should know there is no feeling.🔽Because there is no feeling, one should know there is no perception.🔽Because there is no perception, one should know there is no volitional formation.

original: 'du byed med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no volitional formation, one should know there is no consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no consciousness, one should know there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med @388a *//
analyzed: nam mkha' med @388a *//
translated: Because there is no space,

original: pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: one should know there is no Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o /🔽mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o / mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Great Vehicle, one should know that there is no lack of measurement.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no lack of measurement, one should know that there is no lack of satisfaction.🔽Because there is no lack of satisfaction, one should know that there is no lack of fullness.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no lack of fullness, one should know that there is no lack of all dharmas.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
translated: Subhūti, for this reason

analyzed: sna med pa'i phyir lce med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the nose does not exist, the tongue should be known to be nonexistent.

original: lce med pa'i phyir lus med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lce med pa'i phyir lus med par rig par bya'o //

original: lus med pa'i phyir yid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lus med pa'i phyir yid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the body does not exist, the mind should be known to be nonexistent.

original: yid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the mind does not exist, space should be known to be nonexistent.

original: nam mkha' med @389a *//🔽pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par reg par bya'o //🔽theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med @389a *// pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par reg par bya'o // theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because space does not exist,🔽the Great Vehicle should be known to be nonexistent.🔽Because the Great Vehicle does not exist, the immeasurable should be known to be nonexistent.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the immeasurable does not exist, the infinite should be known to be nonexistent.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because there is no one who is not satisfied, one should know that there is no one who is not provided for.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because there is no one who is not provided for, one should know that there is no dharma that is not provided for.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhūti, for this reason too the Great Vehicle provides room for countless, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, sentient being, living being, nourished being, creature, person, human being,

original: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
translated: feeler, knower, seer, and inconceivable element are all non-apprehensible.

original: mig gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang // lce gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: mig gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang // lce gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
translated: and whatever the eye, whatever the ear, whatever the nose, whatever the tongue, whatever the body, whatever the thinking mind, whatever space, whatever the Great Vehicle,

original: mi 'jal pa gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang @389b yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'jal pa gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang @389b yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: whatever the immeasurable, whatever the unlimited, whatever the inconceivable, whatever all dharmas, all those are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //🔽sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //🔽srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o // sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o // srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self there is the nonexistence of a being.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of a being there is the nonexistence of a living being.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a living being there is the nonexistence of an individual soul.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of an individual soul there is the nonexistence of humankind.

original: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of humankind there is the nonexistence of a person.

original: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //🔽gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o // gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no person, one should know that there is no individual.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no individual, one should know that there is no self of sentient beings.

original: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no self of sentient beings, one should know that there is no creator.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba bo med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba bo med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no creator, one should know that there is no experiencer.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no experiencer, one should know that there is no knower.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no knower, one should know that there is no seer.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no seer, one should know that there is no inconceivable element.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir gzugs med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir gzugs med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no inconceivable element, one should know that there is no form.

original: gzugs med pa'i phyir sgra med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phyir sgra med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no form, one should know that there is no sound.

original: sgra med pa'i phyir dri med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sgra med pa'i phyir dri med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no sound, one should know that there is no smell.

original: dri med pa'i phyir ro med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dri med pa'i phyir ro med par rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the other two are not so, because they are not stainless.

original: ro med pa'i phyir reg med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ro med pa'i phyir reg med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because of the absence of taste, one should know that there is no contact.

original: reg med pa'i phyir chos med par rig par bya'o /🔽chos med @390a *//
analyzed: reg med pa'i phyir chos med par rig par bya'o / chos med @390a *//
translated: because of the absence of contact, one should know that there are no dharmas.

original: pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because of the absence of dharmas, one should know that there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because of the absence of space, one should know that there is no Great Vehicle.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because of the absence of the Great Vehicle, one should know that there is no immeasurable.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because of the absence of the immeasurable, one should know that there is no infinite.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because of the absence of the infinite, one should know that there is no incalculable.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because of the absence of the incalculable, one should know that there is no all-dharmas.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po des sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po des sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhūti, from this one of many explanations one should know that this Great Vehicle gives freedom from fear to limitless, incalculable beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, the sentient being, the living being, the nourished being, the person, the born being, the one reborn, the world, the human, the human being, the one who does, the one who feels, the one who knows, and the one who sees are all non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, the sentient being, the living being, the nourished being, the person, the man, the human, the descendant of Manu, the feeder, the experiencer, the knower, the seer, and the inconceivable realm,

original: gzugs gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
translated: form, sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental objects, space, and the Great Vehicle,🔽are all nondual and indivisible.

original: mi 'jal ba gang yin @390b pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba gang yin @390b pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all those things, which are not measured, which are not filled, which are not estimated, and which are all dharmas, are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir /🔽sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir / sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self🔽there is the nonexistence of a being.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of a being there is the nonexistence of a soul.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //🔽srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //🔽skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o // srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o // 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o // gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o // skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a soul there is the nonexistence of an individual.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of an individual there is the nonexistence of a person.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of a person there is the nonexistence of a human being.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of a human being there is the nonexistence of one who lives.

original: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who lives there is the nonexistence of one who is born.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who is born there is the nonexistence of one who grows.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who grows there is the nonexistence of one who is nourished.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who is nourished there is the nonexistence of one who is strong.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who is strong there is the nonexistence of one who is weak.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who is weak there is the nonexistence of one who is powerful.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who is powerful there is the nonexistence of one who is powerless.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who is powerless there is the nonexistence of one who is a master.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who is a master there is the nonexistence of one who is a lord.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who is a lord there is the nonexistence of one who is a master of the world.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who is a master of the world there is the nonexistence of one who is a lord of the world.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who is a lord of the world there is the nonexistence of one who is a world monarch.🔽You should know that

original: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no self, one should know that there is no agent.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no agent, one should know that there is no experiencer.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no experiencer, one should know that there is no knower.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no knower, one should know that there is no seer.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no seer, one should know that there is no inconceivable element.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir /
translated: Since there is no inconceivable element,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: one should know that there is no eye consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa med par rig par @391a *//
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa med par rig par @391a *//
translated: Since there is no eye consciousness, one should know that there is no ear consciousness.🔽Since there is no ear consciousness, one should know that there is no nose consciousness.

original: bya'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bya'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no nose consciousness, one should know that there is no tongue consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the body consciousness does not exist because the tongue consciousness does not exist.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the mind consciousness does not exist because the body consciousness does not exist.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that space does not exist because the mind consciousness does not exist.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the Great Vehicle does not exist because space does not exist.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the immeasurable does not exist because the Great Vehicle does not exist.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the unfathomable does not exist because the immeasurable does not exist.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the indefinable does not exist because the unfathomable does not exist.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that all dharmas do not exist because the indefinable does not exist.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhūti, from this one of many explanations you should know that this Great Vehicle provides room for limitless, countless beings.

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

analyzed: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin @391b pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /

analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: the immeasurable, the incalculable, and

analyzed: chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: all phenomena are non-apprehensible.

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o // sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o // srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the non-existence of a self, there are no sentient beings.🔽Because of the non-existence of sentient beings, you should know that there is no life-force.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //🔽skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o // gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o // skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of a life-force, you should know that there is no person.🔽Because of the non-existence of a person, you should know that there is no human being.

original: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of a human being, you should know that there is no individual.🔽Because of the non-existence of an individual, you should know that there is no one who knows and sees.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no sentient being, one should know that there is no self of sentient beings.

original: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no self of sentient beings, one should know that there is no agent.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //🔽tshor ba @392a *//
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o // tshor ba @392a *//
translated: Since there is no agent, one should know that there is no experiencer.

original: po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no experiencer, one should know that there is no knower.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no knower, one should know that there is no seer.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o /
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o /
translated: Since there is no seer, one should know that there is no inconceivable element.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa med par rig par bya'o /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa med par rig par bya'o / mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no inconceivable element, one should know that there is no eye contact.🔽Since there is no eye contact, one should know that there is no ear contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no ear contact, one should know that there is no nose contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the contact of the tongue is nonexistent because the contact of the nose is nonexistent.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the contact of the body is nonexistent because the contact of the tongue is nonexistent.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the contact of the mind is nonexistent because the contact of the body is nonexistent.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that space is nonexistent because the contact of the mind is nonexistent.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o /
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o /
translated: You should know that the Great Vehicle is nonexistent because space is nonexistent.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the immeasurable is nonexistent because the Great Vehicle is nonexistent.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the uncountable is nonexistent because the immeasurable is nonexistent.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the unequaled is nonexistent because the uncountable is nonexistent.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that all dharmas are nonexistent because the unequaled is nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa @392b chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa @392b chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhūti, for this reason too the Great Vehicle accommodates limitless, countless beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, the sentient being, the living being, the nourished being, the person, the individual,

original: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
translated: the humankind, the human, the one who does, the one who feels, the one who knows, the one who sees, and the inconceivable expanse are all non-apprehensible.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: the eye contact, the ear contact, the nose contact, the tongue contact, the body contact,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: and the mind contact, and also space, the Great Vehicle, the immeasurable, the incalculable, the infinite,

original: chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro // rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and all phenomena are all unapprehendable.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self, there is no sentient being.

original: srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a sentient being, you should know that there is no life force.🔽Because of the nonexistence of a life force, you should know that there is no person.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med @393a *//🔽par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med @393a *// par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no passing away, one should know that there is no present.🔽Since there is no present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Since there is no future, one should know that there is no past.🔽Since there is no past, one should know that there is no present.

original: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Since there is no future, one should know that there is no past.

original: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no past, one should know that there is no present.

original: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Since there is no future, one should know that there is no past.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //🔽shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //🔽byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o // shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o // byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no past, one should know that there is no present.🔽Since there is no present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Since there is no future, one should know that there is no past.🔽Since there is no past, one should know that there is no present.🔽Since there is no present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Since there is no future, one should know that there is no past.🔽Since there is no past, one should know that there is no present.🔽Since there is no present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Since there is no future, one should know that there is no past.🔽Since there is no past, one should know that there is no present.🔽Since there is no present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Since there is no future, one should know that there is no past.🔽Since there is no past, one should know that there is no present.🔽Since there is no present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Since there is no future, one should know that there is no past.🔽Since there is no past, one should know that there is no present.🔽Since there is no present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Since there is no future, one should know that there is no past.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no past, one should know that there is no present.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //🔽mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //🔽mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Since there is no future, one should know that there is no past

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the inconceivable realm does not exist, one should know that contact at the eye sense-sphere as a condition for feeling does not exist.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because contact at the eye sense-sphere as a condition for feeling does not exist, one should know that contact at the ear sense-sphere as a condition for feeling does not exist.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because contact at the ear sense-sphere as a condition for feeling does not exist, one should know that contact at the nose sense-sphere as a condition for feeling does not exist.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because contact at the nose sense-sphere as a condition for feeling does not exist, one should know that contact at the tongue sense-sphere as a condition for feeling does not exist.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because contact at the tongue sense-sphere as a condition for feeling does not exist,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med @393b par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med @393b par rig par bya'o //
translated: one should know that contact at the body sense-sphere as a condition for feeling does not exist.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the feeling which has tactile sensations for a condition, one should know that the feeling which has mental activity for a condition does not exist.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the feeling which has mental activity for a condition, one should know that space does not exist.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of space, one should know that the Great Vehicle does not exist.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the Great Vehicle, one should know that the immeasurable does not exist.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the immeasurable, one should know that the infinite does not exist.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the infinite, one should know that the unlimited does not exist.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the unlimited, one should know that all things do not exist.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhuti, by this method also that Great Vehicle outshines the world with its gods, men and Asuras and is revealed as surpassing it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes ba gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes ba gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhuti: Because the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix of the Tathagatas, and the one who has gone forth to the supreme enlightenment is the Tathagata.🔽The Lord: So it is, Subhuti, so it is.🔽

original: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
