analyzed: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, the sentient being, the living being, the nourished being, the person, the born being, the human being, the human, the master, the maker, the feeler, the knower, the seer, and the inconceivable element,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna'i @394a *//
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna'i @394a *//
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact,

original: 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact, and the feeling that arises from the condition of thinking-mind contact,

original: nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: space, the Great Vehicle, the immeasurable, the incalculable, the infinite, and all dharmas—all these are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //🔽sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o // sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self there is no sentient being.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of a sentient being there is no life-force.

original: srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a life-force there is no person.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of going, one should know that there is no coming.🔽Because of the absence of coming, one should know that there is no going.

original: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //🔽skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o // skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of going and coming, one should know that there is no staying.

original: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //🔽shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o // shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of staying, one should know that there is no sitting.🔽Because of the absence of sitting, one should know that there is no lying down.

original: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of lying down, one should know that there is no standing.

original: byed pa pa med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa pa med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of standing, one should know that there is no arising.🔽Because of the absence of arising, one should know that there is no passing away.🔽Because of the absence of passing away, one should know that there is no present.🔽Because of the absence of the present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Because of the absence of the future, one should know that there is no past.🔽Because of the absence of the past, one should know that there is no present.🔽Because of the absence of the present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Because of the absence of the future, one should know that there is no past.🔽Because of the absence of the past, one should know that there is no present.🔽Because of the absence of the present, one should know that there is no future.🔽Because of the absence of the future, one should know that there is no past.🔽Because of the absence of the past, one should know that there is no future.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the future, one should know that there is no present.🔽Because of the absence of the present, one should know that there is no past.🔽Because of the absence of the past, one should know that there is no future.🔽Because of the absence of the future, one should know that there is no present.🔽Because of the absence of the present, one should know that there is no past.🔽Because of the absence of the past, one should know that there is no future.

original: @394b shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: @394b shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the future, one should know that there is no present.🔽Because of the absence of the present, one should know that there is no past.🔽Because of the absence of the past, one should know that there is no future.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir sa'i khams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir sa'i khams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the future, one should know that there is no present.🔽Because of the absence of the present, one should know

original: sa'i khams med pa'i phyir chu'i khams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams med pa'i phyir chu'i khams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the earth element does not exist, the water element should be known not to exist.

original: chu'i khams med pa'i phyir me'i khams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams med pa'i phyir me'i khams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the water element does not exist, the fire element should be known not to exist.

original: me'i khams med pa'i phyir rlung gi khams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: me'i khams med pa'i phyir rlung gi khams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the fire element does not exist, the wind element should be known not to exist.

original: rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the wind element does not exist, the space element should be known not to exist.

original: nam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the space element does not exist, the consciousness element should be known not to exist.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the consciousness element does not exist, space should be known not to exist.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because space does not exist, the Great Vehicle should be known not to exist.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o // mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the Great Vehicle does not exist, the immeasurable should be known not to exist.🔽Because the immeasurable does not exist, the infinite should be known not to exist.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the infinite does not exist, the incalculable should be known not to exist.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-apprehension of a person, all dharmas should be known as non-existent.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhūti, by this one of many explanations this Great Vehicle outshines the world with its gods, humans, and asuras and goes beyond it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog @395a *//🔽gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang / shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog @395a *// gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang / shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because a self, a sentient being, a living being,

original: tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams gang yin pa dang /
translated: a creature, a person, a human being, a human, one who lives, one who feels, one who knows, one who sees, and the inconceivable element, the earth element, the water element,

original: me'i khams gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: me'i khams gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
translated: the fire element, the wind element, the space element, the consciousness element, space, the Great Vehicle,

original: mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: what is not measured, what is not filled, what is not weighed, and all phenomena are all non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //🔽sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //🔽srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o // sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o // srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self, there are no sentient beings.🔽Because of the nonexistence of sentient beings, you should know that there is no life force.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a life force, you should know that there is no human being.

original: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a human being, you should know that there is no person.🔽Because of the nonexistence of a person, you should know that there is no individual.

original: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //🔽gang zag med pa'i @395b phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o // gang zag med pa'i @395b phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no person, one should know that there is no individual.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no individual, one should know that there is no self.

original: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no self, one should know that there is no creator.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no creator, one should know that there is no experiencer.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no experiencer, one should know that there is no knower.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no knower, one should know that there is no seer.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no seer, one should know that there is no inconceivable element.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir ma rig pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir ma rig pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no inconceivable element, one should know that there is no ignorance.

original: ma rig pa med pa'i phyir 'du byed med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa med pa'i phyir 'du byed med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no ignorance, one should know that there are no dispositions.

original: 'du byed med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of formations, consciousness should be understood as non-existent.

original: rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of consciousness, name-and-form should be understood as non-existent.

original: ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir skye mched drug med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir skye mched drug med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of name-and-form, the six sense spheres should be understood as non-existent.

original: skye mched drug med pa'i phyir reg pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug med pa'i phyir reg pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the six sense spheres, contact should be understood as non-existent.

original: reg pa med pa'i phyir tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: reg pa med pa'i phyir tshor ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of contact, feeling should be understood as non-existent.

original: tshor ba med pa'i phyir sred pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba med pa'i phyir sred pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of feeling, craving should be understood as non-existent.

original: sred pa med pa'i phyir len pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sred pa med pa'i phyir len pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of craving, grasping should be understood as non-existent.

original: len pa med pa'i phyir srid pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: len pa med pa'i phyir srid pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of grasping, becoming should be understood as non-existent.

original: srid pa med pa'i phyir skye ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: srid pa med pa'i phyir skye ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of becoming, birth should be understood as non-existent.

original: skye ba med pa'i phyir rga shi med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i phyir rga shi med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of birth, old age and death should be understood as non-existent.

original: rga shi med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rga shi med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of old age and death, space should be understood as non-existent.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po @396a *//🔽med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po @396a *// med par rig par bya'o //
translated: the Great Vehicle should be known as nonexistent.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because the Great Vehicle does not exist, the immeasurable should be known as nonexistent.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because the immeasurable does not exist, the infinite should be known as nonexistent.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because the infinite does not exist, the unlimited should be known as nonexistent.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: because the unlimited does not exist, all dharmas should be known as nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang /
translated: Subhūti, for this reason

original: theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: that Great Vehicle makes room for immeasurable, innumerable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, sentient being, living being, nourished being, creature, person, individual,

original: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
translated: the one who is the agent, the one who feels, the one who knows, the one who sees, and the inconceivable element,

original: ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
translated: ignorance, volitional factors, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling,

original: sred pa gang yin pa dang / len pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang @396b yin pa dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: sred pa gang yin pa dang / len pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang @396b yin pa dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
translated: craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and aging and death, space, and the Mahāyāna,

original: mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro /
translated: because all those things, which are immeasurable, which are uncountable, which are incalculable, and which are all dharmas, are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //🔽sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o // sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self there is the nonexistence of a being.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of a being there is the nonexistence of a soul.

original: srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //🔽skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o // 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o // gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o // skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a soul there is the nonexistence of an individual.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of an individual there is the nonexistence of a person.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of a person there is the nonexistence of a human being.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of a human being there is the nonexistence of one who lives.

original: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who lives there is the nonexistence of one who nourishes.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //🔽shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //🔽shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who nourishes there is the nonexistence of one who knows.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of one who knows there is the nonexistence of one who sees.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no agent, one should know that there is no experiencer.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no experiencer, one should know that there is no knower.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no knower, one should know that there is no seer.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no seer, one should know that there is no inconceivable element.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //🔽sbyin pa'i @397a *//
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o // sbyin pa'i @397a *//
translated: Because there is no inconceivable element, one should know that there is no perfection of giving.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no perfection of giving, one should know that there is no perfection of morality.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no perfection of morality, one should know that there is no perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no perfection of patience, one should know that there is no perfection of perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration should be known as nonexistent because the perfection of perseverance is nonexistent.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom should be known as nonexistent because the perfection of concentration is nonexistent.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Space should be known as nonexistent because the perfection of wisdom is nonexistent.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The Great Vehicle should be known as nonexistent because space is nonexistent.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The immeasurable should be known as nonexistent because the Great Vehicle is nonexistent.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The uncountable should be known as nonexistent because the immeasurable is nonexistent.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The unequaled should be known as nonexistent because the uncountable is nonexistent.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: All phenomena should be known as nonexistent because the unequaled is nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhuti, for this reason the Great Vehicle provides room for countless, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro @397b ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro @397b ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
translated: And why?

original: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhuti, it is because the self, the sentient being, the living being, the nourished being, the man, the person, the individual, the human being, the human, the one who does, the one who feels, the one who knows, the one who sees, and the inconceivable element,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of concentration, the perfection of wisdom, space, the Great Vehicle, the immeasurable,

original: mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro // rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: the incomparable, the infinite, and all phenomena—all of these are not apprehended.

original: sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self, there is no sentient being.🔽Because of the nonexistence of a sentient being, you should know that there is no life force.

original: srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no life, one should know that there is no going.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no going, one should know that there is no coming.

original: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //🔽@398a *// skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //🔽gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o // @398a *// skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o // gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no coming, one should know that there is no person.🔽Because there is no person, one should know that there is no individual.🔽Because there is no individual, one should know that there is no human.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no human, one should know that there is no self.

original: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no self, one should know that there is no agent.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no agent, one should know that there is no experiencer.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no experiencer, one should know that there is no knower.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no knower, one should know that there is no seer.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no seer, one should know that there is no inconceivable element.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the inconceivable realm does not exist, you should know that inner emptiness does not exist.

original: nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because inner emptiness does not exist, you should know that outer emptiness does not exist.

original: phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because outer emptiness does not exist, you should know that inner and outer emptiness does not exist.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because inner and outer emptiness does not exist, you should know that the emptiness of emptiness does not exist.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the emptiness of emptiness does not exist, you should know that great emptiness does not exist.

original: chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because great emptiness does not exist, you should know that the emptiness of ultimate reality does not exist.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the emptiness of ultimate reality does not exist, you should know that the emptiness of conditioned phenomena does not exist.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the emptiness of conditioned phenomena does not exist, you should know that the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena does not exist.

original: @398b 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: @398b 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the emptiness of the unconditioned does not exist, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes should be seen as not existing.🔽Because the emptiness of what is beyond extremes does not exist, the emptiness of the unlimited should be seen as not existing.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the emptiness of the unlimited does not exist, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end should be seen as not existing.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end does not exist, the emptiness of non-dispersal should be seen as not existing.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o // rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the emptiness of non-dispersal does not exist, the emptiness of inherent existence should be seen as not existing.🔽Because the emptiness of inherent existence does not exist, the emptiness of all things should be seen as not existing.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the emptiness of all things does not exist, the emptiness of specific characteristics should be seen as not existing.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of defining characteristics does not exist.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //🔽nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o // nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs @399a *//
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o // mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs @399a *//
translated: You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.

original: pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist because the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist.🔽You

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because there is no one who is not satisfied, one should know that there is no one who is not provided for.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because there is no one who is not provided for, one should know that there is no dharma that is not provided for.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhūti, for this reason too the Great Vehicle provides room for countless, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, sentient being, living being, nourished being, creature, person, human being,

original: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
translated: feeler, knower, seer, and inconceivable element are all non-apprehensible.

original: nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: It is the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent,🔽the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,

original: dor ba @399b med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: dor ba @399b med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, and the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence, space, the Great Vehicle,

original: mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the immeasurable, the incalculable, the infinite, and all dharmas, are all non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //🔽sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //🔽srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o // sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o // srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, you should know that because of the non-existence of a self, there is no sentient being.🔽Because of the non-existence of a sentient being, you should know that there is no life-force.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of a life-force, you should know that there is no person.🔽Because of the non-existence of a person, you should know that there is no individual.

original: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of an individual, you should know that there is no human being.

original: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //🔽gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o // gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no person, one should know that there is no individual.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no individual, one should know that there is no self.

original: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no self, one should know that there is no creator.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no creator, one should know that there is no experiencer.

original: tshor @400a *// ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor @400a *// ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no experiencer, one should know that there is no knower.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no knower, one should know that there is no seer.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o // bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no seer, one should know that there is no inconceivable element.🔽Because there is no inconceivable element, one should know that there are no applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there are no applications of mindfulness, one should know that there are no right efforts.

original: yang dag par spong ba med pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba med pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The bases of psychic power should be understood to be nonexistent because the right efforts are nonexistent.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'i phyir dbang po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'i phyir dbang po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The faculties should be understood to be nonexistent because the bases of psychic power are nonexistent.

original: dbang po med pa'i phyir stobs med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po med pa'i phyir stobs med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The powers should be understood to be nonexistent because the faculties are nonexistent.

original: stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The limbs of awakening should be understood to be nonexistent because the powers are nonexistent.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'i phyir lam med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'i phyir lam med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The path should be understood to be nonexistent because the limbs of awakening are nonexistent.

original: lam med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lam med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Space should be understood to be nonexistent because the path is nonexistent.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The Great Vehicle should be understood to be nonexistent because space is nonexistent.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o // mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The immeasurable should be understood to be nonexistent because the Great Vehicle is nonexistent.🔽The unfathomable should be understood to be nonexistent because the immeasurable is nonexistent.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The inconceivable should be understood to be nonexistent because the unfathomable is nonexistent.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the unfathomable, all dharmas should be known as non-existent.

original: rab @400b 'byor /
analyzed: rab @400b 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: through this one of many explanations, that Great Vehicle provides scope for immeasurable, incalculable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, sentient beings, living beings, living creatures, people, individuals, humankind, human beings, agents, and experiencers,

original: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
translated: the knower, the seer, and the inconceivable element,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong pa gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang yin pa dang / dbang po gang yin pa dang / stobs gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong pa gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang yin pa dang / dbang po gang yin pa dang / stobs gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gang yin pa dang /
translated: the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of supernormal  ability, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: the noble eightfold path, space, the Great Vehicle, the immeasurable, the incalculable, the infinite,

original: chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and all phenomena are all unapprehendable.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //🔽sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig @401a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o // sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig @401a *//
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self, there is no sentient being.🔽Because of the nonexistence of a sentient being, you should know that there is no life force.

original: par bya'o // srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: par bya'o // srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a life force, you should know that there is no person.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o // gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no arising, one should know that there is no passing away.🔽Because there is no arising or passing away, one should know that there is no present.

original: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no present, one should know that there is no future.

original: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no future, one should know that there is no past.🔽Because there is no past, future, or present, one should know that there is no time.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no time, one should know that there is no moment.🔽Because there is no moment, one should know that there is no instant.🔽Because there is no instant, one should know that there is no long.🔽Because there is no long, one should know that there is no short.🔽Because there is no short, one should know that there is no small.🔽Because there is no small, one should know that there is no large.🔽Because there is no large or small, one should know that there is no middle.

original: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no middle, one should know that there is no end.🔽Because there is no end, one should know that there is no middle.🔽Because there is no middle or end, one should know that there is no center.🔽Because there is no center, one should know that there is no end.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no end, one should know that there is no center.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no center or end, one should know that there is no middle.🔽Because there is no middle, end, or center, one should know that there is no past, future, or present.🔽Because there is no past, future, or present, one should know that there is no arising.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //🔽mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //🔽mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no arising, one should know that there is no passing away.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the inconceivable realm does not exist, the noble truths should be understood to not exist.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa med pa'i phyir bsam gtan med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa med pa'i phyir bsam gtan med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the noble truths do not exist, the concentrations should be understood to not exist.

original: bsam gtan med pa'i phyir tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan med pa'i phyir tshad med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the concentrations do not exist, the immeasurables should be understood to not exist.

original: tshad med pa med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the immeasurables do not exist, the formless absorptions should be understood to not exist.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the formless absorptions do not exist, the liberations should be understood to not exist.

original: rnam par thar pa med @401b pa'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa med @401b pa'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the liberations do not exist, the serial absorptions should be understood to not exist.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the serial absorptions do not exist, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation should be understood to not exist.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation, one should know that the superknowledges do not exist.

original: mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the superknowledges, one should know that the meditative stabilizations do not exist.

original: ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the meditative stabilizations, one should know that the dhāraṇī gateways do not exist.

original: gzungs kyi sgo med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the dhāraṇī gateways, one should know that space does not exist.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of space, one should know that the Great Vehicle does not exist.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the Great Vehicle, one should know that the immeasurable does not exist.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the immeasurable, one should know that the infinite does not exist.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the infinite, one should know that the incalculable does not exist.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the incalculable, one should know that all phenomena do not exist.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can chad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can chad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhūti, for this reason too the Great Vehicle is said to provide scope for countless, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang @402a *//
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang @402a *//
translated: And why?

original: yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang / shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang / shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, sentient being, living being, nourished being, creature, person, human being, embodied being, agent, and knower are all non-apprehensible.

original: mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: the one who sees, the inconceivable element, the noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless meditative stabilizations,

original: rnam par thar pa gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: the liberations, the serial absorptions, the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation, the clairvoyances,

original: ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the meditative stabilization, the dhāraṇī gateway, space, the Mahāyāna, the immeasurable, the uncountable, the incalculable, and all dharmas are non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, because of the nonexistence of a self

original: sems can med par rig par bya'o //🔽sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //🔽srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can med par rig par bya'o // sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o // srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: you should know that there is no sentient being.🔽Because of the nonexistence of a sentient being you should know that there is no life-force.

original: 'gro ba @402b med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba @402b med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o // gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a life-force you should know that there is no person.

original: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a person you should know that there is no human being.🔽Because of the nonexistence of a human being you should know that there is no individual.🔽Because of the nonexistence of an individual you should know that there is no human.

original: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the person, one should know the non-existence of the possessor of pleasure and pain.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the possessor of pleasure and pain, one should know the non-existence of the self of pleasure and pain.

original: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the self of pleasure and pain, one should know the non-existence of the agent.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the agent, one should know the non-existence of the experiencer.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the experiencer, one should know the non-existence of the knower.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the knower, one should know the non-existence of the seer.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o // bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the seer, one should know the non-existence of the inconceivable element.🔽Because of the non-existence of the inconceivable element, one should know the non-existence of the powers of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the non-existence of the powers of the Tathāgata, one should know the non-existence of the grounds of self-confidence.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams med pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams med pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges should be understood to be absent.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byams pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byams pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love should be understood to be absent.

original: byams pa chen po med pa'i phyir snying rje chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po med pa'i phyir snying rje chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of great love, great compassion should be understood to be absent.

original: snying rje chen po med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of great compassion, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha should be understood to be absent.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par @403a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par @403a *//
translated: Because of the absence of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, space should be understood to be absent.

original: bya'o // nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bya'o // nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of space, the Great Vehicle should be understood to be absent.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o // mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the Great Vehicle, the immeasurable should be understood to be absent.🔽Because of the absence of the immeasurable, the incalculable should be understood to be absent.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of the incalculable, the unequaled should be understood to be absent.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the absence of any measure, all phenomena should be known as nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhūti, for this reason too the Great Vehicle accommodates limitless, incalculable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
