analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
translated: And why?

original: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, sentient beings, living beings, living creatures, individuals, humankind, those who live and breathe, people, human beings, those who do, and those who feel, those who know and those who see, and the inconceivable expanse,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, great compassion, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi @403b 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi @403b 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: space, the Great Vehicle, the unappraisable, the innumerable, the unequaled, and all dharmas are all nonapprehensible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //🔽sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //🔽srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o // sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o // srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self there is no sentient being.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of a sentient being there is no living being.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a living being there is no person.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of a person there is no human being.

original: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //🔽skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //🔽gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o // skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o // gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no healing, one should know that there is no person.🔽Because there is no person, one should know that there is no individual.🔽Because there is no individual, one should know that there is no human.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no human, one should know that there is no human being.

original: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no human being, one should know that there is no creator.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no creator, one should know that there is no experiencer.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no experiencer, one should know that there is no knower.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no knower, one should know that there is no seer.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no seer, one should know that there is no inconceivable element.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir rigs kyi sa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir rigs kyi sa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no inconceivable element, one should know that there is no level of earnest aspiration.

original: rigs kyi sa med pa'i phyir brgyad pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi sa med pa'i phyir brgyad pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the stage of the lineage does not exist, the stage of the eighth person should be known not to exist.

original: brgyad pa'i sa med pa'i phyir mthong ba'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa'i sa med pa'i phyir mthong ba'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the stage of the eighth person does not exist, the stage of the path of seeing should be known not to exist.

original: mthong ba'i sa med pa'i phyir bsrabs pa'i sa med par rig @404a *//
analyzed: mthong ba'i sa med pa'i phyir bsrabs pa'i sa med par rig @404a *//
translated: Since the stage of the path of seeing does not exist, the stage of thinning should be known not to exist.

original: par bya'o // bsrabs pa'i sa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: par bya'o // bsrabs pa'i sa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the stage of thinning does not exist, the stage of separation from attachment should be known not to exist.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med pa'i phyir byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med pa'i phyir byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the stage of separation from attachment does not exist, the stage of realization of what has been done should be known not to exist.

original: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the stage of realization of what has been done does not exist, space should be known not to exist.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since space does not exist, the Great Vehicle should be known not to exist.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the Great Vehicle does not exist, the immeasurable should be known not to exist.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the immeasurable does not exist, the infinite should be known not to exist.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because there is no one who is not satisfied, one should know that there is no one who is not provided for.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: and because there is no one who is not provided for, one should know that there is no dharma that is not provided for.

original: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //🔽gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o // gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no person, one should know that there is no individual.🔽Because there is no individual, one should know that there is no self.

original: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //🔽shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o // shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no self, one should know that there is no creator.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no creator, one should know that there is no experiencer.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no experiencer, one should know that there is no knower.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig bya'o //🔽mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam @406a *//
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig bya'o // mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam @406a *//
translated: Because there is no knower, one should know that there is no seer.🔽Because there is no seer, one should know that there is no hearer.

original: gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o // bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no hearer, one should know that there is no feeler.🔽Because there is no feeler, one should know that there is no taster.🔽Because there is no taster, one should know that there is no cognizer.🔽Because there is no cognizer, one should know that there is no object cognized.🔽Because there is no object cognized, one should know that there is no object of contemplation.🔽Because there is no object of contemplation, one should know that there is no inconceivable element.🔽Because there is no inconceivable element, one should know that there is no pratyekabuddha.

original: rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no pratyekabuddha, one should know that there is no perfect buddha.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the perfect Buddha, space should be known as nonexistent.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of space, the Great Vehicle should be known as nonexistent.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the Great Vehicle, the immeasurable should be known as nonexistent.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the immeasurable, the incalculable should be known as nonexistent.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the incalculable, the infinite should be known as nonexistent.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the infinite, all dharmas should be known as nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
translated: Subhūti, by this one of many explanations, that Great Vehicle provides scope for countless, immeasurable sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, the sentient being, the living being, the nourished being, the person, the born being, the one reborn, the world, the human, the one who does, the one who feels, the one who knows, and the one who sees are all non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab @406b pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab @406b pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self, the sentient being, the living being, the nourished being, the person, the man, the human, the descendant of Manu, the feeder, the experiencer, the knower, the seer, the inconceivable element,

original: rang sangs rgyas gang yin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas gang yin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: the pratyekabuddha, the completely perfect Buddha, space, the Great Vehicle, the immeasurable, the infinite,

original: mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all those things, up to and including all dharmas, are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o //🔽sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o // sems can med pa'i phyir srog med par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, you should know that because of the nonexistence of a self, there is no sentient being.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of a sentient being, there is no life-force.

original: srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o //🔽'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: srog med pa'i phyir 'gro ba med par rig par bya'o // 'gro ba med pa'i phyir gso ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a life-force, there is no person.

original: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o //🔽skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o //🔽gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gso ba med pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o // skyes bu med pa'i phyir gang zag med par rig par bya'o // gang zag med pa'i phyir shed can med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a person, there is no human being.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of a human being, there is no individual.🔽You should know that because of the nonexistence of an individual, there is no human.

original: shad can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shad can med pa'i phyir shed bdag med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a human, there is no lord of humans.

original: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shed bdag med pa'i phyir byed pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of a lord of humans, there is no agent.

original: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that because of the nonexistence of an agent, there is no experiencer.

original: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no one who feels, one should know there is no one who knows.

original: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no one who knows, one should know there is no one who sees.

original: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no one who sees, one should know there is no inconceivable element.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o //🔽nyan thos kyi @407a *//
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o // nyan thos kyi @407a *//
translated: Because there is no inconceivable element, one should know there is no Śrāvaka Vehicle.🔽Because there is no Śrāvaka Vehicle, one should know there is no Pratyekabuddha Vehicle.

original: theg pa med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o //🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Pratyekabuddha Vehicle, one should know there is no Buddha Vehicle.

original: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no Buddha Vehicle, one should know there is no knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because there is no knowledge of all aspects, one should know there is no space.

original: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because space does not exist, the Great Vehicle should be known as not existing.

original: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the Great Vehicle does not exist, the immeasurable should be known as not existing.

original: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the immeasurable does not exist, the infinite should be known as not existing.

original: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the infinite does not exist, the unlimited should be known as not existing.

original: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o //
translated: Because the unlimited does not exist, all dharmas should be known as not existing.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do //
